attributes.name: orcid
attributes.description:
The ORCiD to display, evaluate and link in this component.
(required)

attributes.name: show-affiliation
attributes.description:
Whether to show the affiliation or not.
(optional) Defaults to true.

attributes.name: show-department
attributes.description:
Whether to show the department of the affiliation or not.
Depends internally on availability of the department in the ORCiD information.
(optional) Defaults to false.

attributes.name: show-orcid
attributes.description:
Whether to show the ORCiD inline or not.
(optional) Defaults to false.

attributes.name: amount-of-items
attributes.description:
The number of items to show in the table per page.
Defaults to 10.
(optional)

attributes.name: current-level-of-subcomponents
attributes.description:
The current level of subcomponents.
Defaults to 0.
(optional)

attributes.name: do-n-o-t-show-subcomponents
attributes.description:
Determines whether subcomponents should generally be shown or not.
If set to true, the component won't show any subcomponents.
If not set, the component will show subcomponents, if the current level of subcomponents is not the total level of subcomponents or greater.
(optional)

attributes.name: level-of-subcomponents
attributes.description:
The total number of levels of subcomponents to show.
Defaults to 1.
(optional)

attributes.name: open-by-default
attributes.description:
Determines whether the component is open or not by default.
(optional)

attributes.name: settings
attributes.description:
A stringified JSON object containing settings for this component.
The resulting object is passed to every subcomponent, so that every component has the same settings.
Values and the according type are defined by the components themselves.
(optional)

Schema:
```typescript
{
 type: string,
 values: {
  name: string,
  value: any
 }[]
}[]
```

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value to parse, evaluate and render.

attributes.name: changing-colors
attributes.description: Should the table inside the component change colors every other line?

attributes.name: current-level-of-subcomponents
attributes.description:
The current elevation level of the subcomponents.
If the difference between the current level and the level of the subcomponents is 0, the subcomponents are not shown.

attributes.name: level-of-subcomponents
attributes.description: The maximum level of subcomponents to show.

attributes.name: open-status
attributes.description: Should the details element be open by default?

attributes.name: show-subcomponents
attributes.description: Should the subcomponents be shown?

description.value:
This component highlights a handle and links to the FAIR DO Scope.
It automatically generates colors for the parts of the handle (prefix and suffix) to make them easily distinguishable.

attributes.name: filled
attributes.description: Whether the component should use the filled or the outlined design.

attributes.name: handle
attributes.description: The Handle to highlight and link in this component.

attributes.name: link-to
attributes.description: An optional custom link to use instead of the default one which links to the FAIR DO Scope.

attributes.name: changing-colors
attributes.description: Should the table inside the component change colors every other line?

attributes.name: current-level-of-subcomponents
attributes.description:
The current elevation level of the subcomponents.
If the difference between the current level and the level of the subcomponents is 0, the subcomponents are not shown.

attributes.description: The Handle to highlight and link in this component.

attributes.name: level-of-subcomponents
attributes.description: The maximum level of subcomponents to show.

attributes.name: open-status
attributes.description: Should the details element be open by default?

attributes.name: show-subcomponents
attributes.description: Should the subcomponents be shown?

attributes.description: Should the table inside the component change colors every other line?

attributes.name: open-status
attributes.description: Should the details element be open by default?
